mapper.select: select img_1, prd_name, prd_saleprice, model_machine, color_detail, cart_quantity from cart c inner join prd_detail pd on c.prd_d_no=pd.prd_d_no inner join model m on pd.model_no = m.model_no inner join color c on pd.color_no=c.color_no inner join prd_master pm on pd.prd_no=pm.prd_no inner join prd_img pi on pd.prd_no= pi.prd_no inner join member m on m.mem_no=c.mem_no where c.mem_no= #{mem_no}
mapper.delete: /* Cart - AllDeleteCart */ delete cart where mem_no=#{mem_no}
